data.name: Frostbitten
data.detailed_description:
You're ending the day at your assigned post when you receive a call from the chief ranger. A colleague, and friend, who is stationed in a nearby sector has failed to report back for a day or so... You are requested to investigate his whereabouts only to find his ranger station in disarray, with no one left in sight. You then venture into the snow-ridden forest, dread setting in, as you realize something is amiss...

Be the Ranger
Make your way through the forest as Thomas, a park ranger for White Valley National Park, as a strange presence lurks among the trees. Survive the night equipped only with a flashlight, shovel, and lighter.

Immerse Yourself
Experience the isolation, paranoia, and mysterious air of a dark, winter forest alive with the sounds of night.

Strategize Your Escape
Use your shovel to create barriers between you and your impending death, but whatever you do, don't stare at it for too long.

Explore the Park
With a flashlight as your guiding light, discover the clues that will bring you closer to the truth.


NOTE: This game is in its open Beta phase and is the product of a student development team. We are very appreciative of everyone who takes the time to play our game and welcome the feedback!

data.short_description: Frostbitten takes you into the depths of a national park's snow-ridden forest; a place notorious for consuming those who enter. Through the eyes of a park ranger in this survival horror experience, discover the dark secrets that lie beyond the clearingâ€¦

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700HQ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: This game is the property of the members of White Valley Studios.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some profanity and fantasy-related violence.
